attributes.action: Immediate review and reform of the education system
attributes.additional_details:
We believe the current education system is outdated, performance led and test heavy, and provides a "one-size-fits-all" education, failing pupils, parents/carers, staff and communities. We think the current system fails to nurture the talents and abilities of a diverse range of individuals.

Schools should be inclusive, nurturing and confidence building institutions where needs and struggles are validated and children are able to express themselves

Put children first!
attributes.background: We want an education system that is more student-centred and holistic, with a greater focus on mutual respect, socialising, mindfulness, freedom for teachers, individual strengths, emotional development, positive reinforcement not punishment, and equal opportunities.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/703964
